title: Lynda -  Office 365: Outlook Essential Training with Jess Stratt
description:
Lynda -  Office 365: Outlook Essential Training with Jess Stratton 

Subjects:  Business Education + Elearning 
Software:  Office, Outlook, Office 365, 


3h 3m Appropriate for all Feb 09, 2015  | Uploaded in Feb 16, 2015 by 2boweb


 
Learn how to leverage the power of Microsoft Outlook for Office 365 to stay on top of all your important connections. In this course, author Jess Stratton introduces you to navigating your email messages, calendar, and contacts in Outlook 2013, the version that Office 365 subscribers use. The course begins with a tour of the interface and shows how to connect to IMAP and POP mail accounts, as well as Facebook, LinkedIn, and even RSS feeds. Jess then shows how to quickly create, send, and read email and organize your inbox; organize, group, and share contacts; and stay on schedule with calendars and tasks. Plus, learn how to increase productivity with tasks and notes, and get data out of Outlook for use elsewhere.
